website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Eva NRG was complimented for being a comfortable workout trainer. Its lightweight nature pleased shoppers in general. It was also praised for its traction on studio floors. However, there were complaints about the outsole’s durability, the upper being too soft, and the footbed being too firm. As for the fit and sizing, people were on the fence because some claimed that it did not follow the brand’s measurement scheme. But in the end, those who were able to purchase the right size and width were contented with their trainers.
pros: The Ryka Eva NRG was immensely praised for the comfort it offered to many of its users
The lightweight construction pleased numerous owners
The fit and length were perfect, according to a lot of consumers
Plenty of gym-goers stated that this model provided support on top of the feet and under the arches during workouts
The durability of this footwear impressed multiple testers
The traction of the outsole provided enough grip and allowed the foot to slide when needed during dance/studio exercises, said several fitness enthusiasts
cons: A significant number of reviewers were dissatisfied with the sizing and the width
others thought it was short and narrow, while some stated that it was large and wide compared to previous Ryka models
The back collar of this Ryka shoe was too high that it caused chafing and blisters for a minority of buyers
The underfoot cushioning was too stiff and caused discomfort for several wearers
The upper material was too soft that it failed to properly lock the foot down of some people
A few folks complained about the quality and durability of the outsole because it peeled off and did not provide much traction

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are okay
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with the laces staying tied, they come undone so often that I have to double tie them which is a pain when it’s time to take off. I will get different laces and see if this helps. These are also a little narrower than I prefer. If you have a very narrow foot, these are good for you. As far as comfort, they are comfortable except for the narrowness. Hoping they stretch out over time but I would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen King

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, modern looking walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have walked in these shoes for countless hours! I like that they are more modern looking than many of the Ryka shoes. I've worn Ryka for many years for Zumba and as walking shoes. This style does seem to run slightly larger than my other Ryka shoes.
customer_reviews.author: su-chan

customer_reviews.title: Blisters!!! Wrong style for me.
customer_reviews.text: These particular Ryka shoes gave me horrible blisters under my inside ankle bones. I teach group exercise classes and had decided that Ryka was my new, go-to shoe. My first 3 pairs (which were another style) were fantastic and fit perfectly. This pair had and odd seam that did not work with my foot/ankle structure. I'd like to return, but I have worn them and thrown away the box, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Fish

customer_reviews.title: Soft Material
customer_reviews.text: These will work for exercise and fit fine. The material is very soft, so I use an old shoehorn so the heel doesn't scrunch down when I put them on. In general I love Ryka shoes. These surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Heel is VERY wide
customer_reviews.text: Length of shoe is fine. But I’m so disappointed in Ryka the past year. I’ve worn Ryka shoes exclusively for 10 years because they were the only shoe that fit my narrow heel. Now the heel area is super wide in the medium size, even though they’ve added wide sizes! I’ve returned about 10 pair this year trying to find a style that still fits me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Good value shoe, but recommend getting a larger size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in Size: 7.5 Wide | Color: Black. Initially when I wore these I had thick socks on and my feet were numb after working out. I wore again today for my work out with thinner socks and I specifically didn't tie the shoe strings and it was still a little tight, but this helped a ton. I recommend getting a half size larger, if you normally wear a wide width or switch out shoe strings for a longer pair.
customer_reviews.author: Greda

customer_reviews.title: Petfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The only brand that I wear, light weight durable and color is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Ryka’s since 1996. They are the best. This is a new style for me. I love the way they fit. They are lightweight, give good support and are extremely comfortable. The black and white style is hard to find and are subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the blue and pink. They’re comfortable and great for running errands. I haven’t had the opportunity to wear them for more than a few hours as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with the comfort and fit of theses sneakers ! I have a wide foot and it’s hard to get a good fit ! Theses sneakers are like walking on air !! I had to buy another pair in a different color!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes with arch support
customer_reviews.text: Good arch support, insole is removable. These are comfortable shoes and the insole is a good one. I like the toe box since it has no toe protector over the toe.
customer_reviews.author: TAC

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. She loves how light weight they are. Her only problem is she needs to find more clothes to match the pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I can’t say enough about them. Every pair I’ve ever purchased and worn have been excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes made for Women, Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies should know that these shoes, made for women's feet are normally a little wide. that is a good thing for me, but ladies with a narrow foot should look at Nikes. I like Nikes, the multiple styles are endless, but they never fit me as well as Rykas.
customer_reviews.author: Bamma

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing because either have always loved my other Rykas
customer_reviews.text: I washed these shoes ONCE and the sole is separating on the toe. I did not tumble dry, just air dry and this happened. So disappointing because either have always loved my other Rykas.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but feels even better!
customer_reviews.text: The comfort and support of the shoe is amazing. Feels like you're walking on a cloud that you won't fall through. The shoe looks exactly as described. Very stylish and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shamen'e Childress

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The only brand I buy that doesn’t cause my plantar fasciitis to flair up.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Comfort goes a long way!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is comfortable, but a bit too wide at the top, so I will use them for around the house and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: Heel wearing away
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and feel of this sneaker, however, I’ve been wearing them for running little over a month, and the heel bottom is already beginning to wear away.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Duke

product_meta.title: Ryka Women's Eva Nrg Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: Minimal overlays keep the eva nrg feeling fresh and streamlined. Single gore strap across the vamp to keep her feeling secure. Soft eva with re-zorb® nrg drop in for superior cushion and rebound.
feature_bullets: Textile upper with single gore band and synthetic overlays.
Soft EVA with RE-ZORB NRG drop in for superior cushion and rebound.
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
